descriptions.value: Being a member of Product team and working on GUI development of Ikena and other softwares. Some of the responsibilities:

value: Working with JIRA, Bitbucket and Git
Writing modern, well designed, testable and readable C#/.NET code
Develop WPF, WinForms in Visual Studio
Implementing new features and fixing various of bugs
Refactoring to match the modern patterns and architectures
Memory and performance profiling and optimization
Accepting change suggestions, as well as suggesting changes to pull requests
Keep the good communication with all members of team, as well as with other teams
Reduced overall system build time by about 30%-40%
Refactored project dependencies for easier maintenance and deployment

descriptions.value: Creating a desktop application that can detect copy-move on an image made in some editor like Photoshop. Designed by R&D Team and Product Team. R&D Team worked on copy-move detection filter, Product Team worked on application GUI and communication with Core. I was a part of Product Team.

value: Creating C#/.NET WPF windows desktop application connected with C++ over Managed C++
Creating immutable application state with Redux and Reactive Extensions for .NET
Writing well designed, testable and readable code covered by Unit tests
Presenting the development progress to teams abroad

descriptions.value: It was nice experience and learned a lot from experienced software engineers.

A Web application that allows users to create, archive, filter, sort and show invoices with ASP.NET MVC and SQL Server database. Some of the main responsibilities were creating a backend server and database, designing and implementing a user interface, connecting all those parts and creating an email notification system.
